Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

This is user issue, i.e. I'm not running scripts etc. If after doing a Google search I right click and select the link to open in a new tab, it will open it in another window, not the current one.


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open a new Firefox window
2. Use Google to search for something (doesn't matter what)
3. Open a new Firefox Window
4. From 1st window right click and select 'Open Link in New Tab'
5. The tab is created and opened in the 2nd window, instead of the expected current window.
Actual Results:  
Selected tab was opened in non active window.

Expected Results:  
New tab should have been created and opened in current window.
